statements: DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE peak_hour = TRUE;
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE id = 1 AND energy_consumed > 100.0
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE peak_hour = true AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM peak_hours WHERE peak = TRUE
DELETE FROM peak_hours WHERE peak = TRUE;
DELETE FROM energy_data WHERE user_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM peak_hours WHERE peak_start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00' AND peak_end_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '22:00:00';
DELETE FROM device_energy_usage WHERE device_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
